attributes.action: Not have a two tier government pension
attributes.additional_details: Is it unreasonable to want the same pension as somebody who was born after 6th April 1951 or 6th April 1953. I was born 17-02-1947 my wife on 30-11-1948, we have the same food /energy bills as people born after April 1951/ April 1953 so why do the government believe we need less to live on
attributes.background: Make the UK pension one tier and not two

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614050
